mapper.select: /* LoginMapper.selectById */ SELECT username AS id , password AS pw , FORMATDATETIME(NVL(last_login_dt, SYSDATE), 'yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm:ss') AS last_login_dt , FORMATDATETIME(NVL(last_pwd_upd_dt, SYSDATE), 'yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm:ss') AS last_pwd_upd_dt FROM member_account WHERE username = #{id}
